action.action-desc: Mr. Owens introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act with respect to water quality criteria development and transparency, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Water Quality Criteria Development and Transparency Act.

section.header: Water quality criteria development and transparency

subsection.text: Section 304(a) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1314(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: After the date of enactment of this paragraph, the Administrator shall issue any new or revised water quality criteria under paragraph (1) or (9) by rule.
